course_title: Spec. Topics In Political Science: African Politics
class_notes:
Students who are not Political Science Majors are encouraged to contact the Instructor prior to enrolling.


This course is an exploration of certain themes related to African politics and the African experience as manifested in its cultural dynamics, religious undercurrents, and social diversity.
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Seminar and/or advanced class in selected political science topics. Primarily for students interested in politics.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3795, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: S. Shomade, Status: Closed
